title: Considerations for Coverage of Mass Shootings
description: This tipsheet provides guidance on how to responsibly cover mass shootings, including limiting the name and likeness of the shooter and focusing on the victims and communities affected. It also discusses the potential for copycat crimes and the importance of promoting data and analysis from experts.
